targets.rawSql:
-- select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads where $__timeFilter(created_at);

select * from uploads up inner join institution_classes ic on up.institution_class_id = ic.id
inner join institutions i on ic.institution_id = i.id 
inner join institution_class_grades icg on ic.id = icg.institution_class_id
inner join education_grades eg on eg.id = icg.education_grade_id
-- where  i.id = $code
-- and eg.code = '$grade'
-- and $__timeFilter(created_at);
-- select * from uploads  limit 10

-- select count(*) from institution_students ist
-- inner join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
-- inner join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
-- inner join education_grades eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
-- where  i.id = $code
-- and eg.code = '$grade'
-- and stu.gender_id = 1
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads where   is_processed != 0 and $__timeFilter(updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads where   is_processed != 0 and $__timeFilter(updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads where   is_processed != 0 and $__timeFilter(updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.update = 1 and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.insert = 3 and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.insert = 3 and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.is_email_sent in (1,2) and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.update in  (1,3) and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where up.insert = 3 and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads up where   up.is_processed = 2 and up.update = 2 and $__timeFilter(up.updated_at);
select count(*) , created_at as time from uploads where   is_processed in (2) and $__timeFilter(updated_at);

select 
  eg.name as `Grade` ,
  stu.openemis_no as `Student ID`,  
  stu.first_name as `Full Name`, 
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT edus.name) as `Subjects`,
  IFNULL(LEFT(RIGHT(count(DISTINCT edus.id),8),4),'NA') as `Number of Subjects`,
  DATE_FORMAT(stu.date_of_birth ,'%W, %M %e, %Y ' ) as `Date of Birth` , 
  g.name as `Gender`, 
  IFNULL(nati.name, 'NA') as `Nationality`,
  IFNULL(idt.national_code, 'NA') as `Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(LEFT(RIGHT(stu.identity_number,8),4),'NA') as `Identity Number`,
  IFNULL (stu.identity_number,'na') as `Testing`,
  ic.name as `Class` ,  
  IFNULL(special_need_types.name, 'NA') as `Special Need Type`,
  IFNULL(special_need_difficulties.name, 'NA') as `Special Need`,
  IFNULL(stu.address, 'NA') as `Address`,
  IFNULL(acp.name, 'NA') as `BMI Academic Period`,
  DATE_FORMAT(bmit.date,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `BMI Date`,
  IFNULL(bmit.height, 'NA') as `Height`,
  IFNULL(bmit.weight, 'NA') as `Weight`,
  IFNULL(acps.name, 'NA') as `Academic Periods`,
  DATE_FORMAT(ist.start_date,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Start Date`,
  IFNULL(bro.name, 'NA') as `Birth Registrar Office`,
  IFNULL(ds.name, 'NA') as `DS Office`,
  stu.address_area_id,
  IFNULL(sufu.first_name, 'NA') as `Father's Name`, 
  IFNULL(natif.name, 'NA') as `Father's Nationality`,
  DATE_FORMAT(sufu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Father's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sufu.address , 'N/A') as `Father's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtf.national_code, 'NA') as `Father's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sufu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Father's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(sumu.first_name, 'N/A') as `Mothers's Name`,
  IFNULL(natim.name, 'NA') as `Mothers's Nationality`, 
  DATE_FORMAT(sumu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Mothers's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sumu.address , 'N/A') as `Mothers's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtm.national_code, 'NA') as `Mothers's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sumu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Mother's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(sugu.first_name , 'N/A') as `Guardian's Name`,
  IFNULL(natig.name, 'NA') as `Guardian's Nationality`,
  DATE_FORMAT(sugu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Guardian's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sugu.address , 'N/A') as `Guardian's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtg.national_code, 'NA') as `Guardian's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sugu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Guardian's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(ubm.body_mass_index , 'N/A') as `BMI`
  from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
left join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
left join education_grades  eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
left join institution_class_students ics on ist.student_id = ics.student_id
left join institution_classes ic on   ic.id = ics.institution_class_id 
left join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
left join student_guardians sgf on sgf.student_id = stu.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join security_users sufu on sgf.guardian_id = sufu.id
left join student_guardians sgm on sgm.student_id = stu.id  and sgm.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join security_users sumu on sgm.guardian_id = sumu.id
left join student_guardians sg on sg.student_id = stu.id   and sg.guardian_relation_id = 3
left join security_users sugu on sg.guardian_id = sugu.id
left join user_body_masses as ubm on ubm.security_user_id  = ist.student_id and 	ubm.academic_period_id = ist.academic_period_id
left join genders g on stu.gender_id = g.id
left join area_administratives bro on stu.birthplace_area_id = bro.id 
left join area_administratives ds on stu.address_area_id = ds.id  
left join nationalities nati on stu.nationality_id = nati.id 
left join identity_types idt on stu.nationality_id = idt.id
Left join user_special_needs on ist.id = user_special_needs.security_user_id
left join special_need_types on special_need_types.id = user_special_needs.special_need_type_id
left join special_need_difficulties on special_need_difficulties.id = user_special_needs.special_need_difficulty_id
left join user_body_masses bmit on stu.id = bmit.security_user_id
left join academic_periods acp on acp.id = bmit.academic_period_id
left join academic_periods acps on acps.id = ist.academic_period_id
left join institution_subject_students iss on stu.id = iss.student_id
left join education_subjects edus on edus.id = iss.education_subject_id
left join nationalities natif on sufu.nationality_id = natif.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join nationalities natim on sumu.nationality_id = natif.id and sgm.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join nationalities natig on sugu.nationality_id = natif.id and sg.guardian_relation_id = 3
left join identity_types idtf on sufu.nationality_id = idtf.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join identity_types idtm on sumu.nationality_id = idtm.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join identity_types idtg on sugu.nationality_id = idtg.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 3
where i.id = $code
group by stu.openemis_no

select 
  eg.name as `Grade` ,
  stu.openemis_no as `Student ID`,  
  stu.first_name as `Full Name`, 
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT edus.name) as `Subjects`,
  IFNULL(LEFT(RIGHT(count(DISTINCT edus.id),8),4),'NA') as `Number of Subjects`,
  DATE_FORMAT(stu.date_of_birth ,'%W, %M %e, %Y ' ) as `Date of Birth` , 
  g.name as `Gender`, 
  IFNULL(nati.name, 'NA') as `Nationality`,
  IFNULL(idt.national_code, 'NA') as `Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(LEFT(RIGHT(stu.identity_number,8),4),'NA') as `Identity Number`,
  IFNULL (stu.identity_number,'na') as `Testing`,
  ic.name as `Class` ,  
  IFNULL(special_need_types.name, 'NA') as `Special Need Type`,
  IFNULL(special_need_difficulties.name, 'NA') as `Special Need`,
  IFNULL(stu.address, 'NA') as `Address`,
  IFNULL(acp.name, 'NA') as `BMI Academic Period`,
  DATE_FORMAT(bmit.date,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `BMI Date`,
  IFNULL(bmit.height, 'NA') as `Height`,
  IFNULL(bmit.weight, 'NA') as `Weight`,
  IFNULL(acps.name, 'NA') as `Academic Periods`,
  DATE_FORMAT(ist.start_date,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Start Date`,
  IFNULL(bro.name, 'NA') as `Birth Registrar Office`,
  IFNULL(ds.name, 'NA') as `DS Office`,
  stu.address_area_id,
  IFNULL(sufu.first_name, 'NA') as `Father's Name`, 
  IFNULL(natif.name, 'NA') as `Father's Nationality`,
  DATE_FORMAT(sufu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Father's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sufu.address , 'N/A') as `Father's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtf.national_code, 'NA') as `Father's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sufu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Father's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(sumu.first_name, 'N/A') as `Mothers's Name`,
  IFNULL(natim.name, 'NA') as `Mothers's Nationality`, 
  DATE_FORMAT(sumu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Mothers's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sumu.address , 'N/A') as `Mothers's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtm.national_code, 'NA') as `Mothers's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sumu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Mother's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(sugu.first_name , 'N/A') as `Guardian's Name`,
  IFNULL(natig.name, 'NA') as `Guardian's Nationality`,
  DATE_FORMAT(sugu.date_of_birth,'%W, %M %e, %Y ') as `Guardian's Date Of Birth`,
  IFNULL(sugu.address , 'N/A') as `Guardian's Address`,
  IFNULL(idtg.national_code, 'NA') as `Guardian's Identity Type`,
  IFNULL(sugu.identity_number, 'NA') as `Guardian's Identity Number`,
  IFNULL(ubm.body_mass_index , 'N/A') as `BMI`
  from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
left join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
left join education_grades  eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
left join institution_class_students ics on ist.student_id = ics.student_id
left join institution_classes ic on   ic.id = ics.institution_class_id 
left join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
left join student_guardians sgf on sgf.student_id = stu.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join security_users sufu on sgf.guardian_id = sufu.id
left join student_guardians sgm on sgm.student_id = stu.id  and sgm.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join security_users sumu on sgm.guardian_id = sumu.id
left join student_guardians sg on sg.student_id = stu.id   and sg.guardian_relation_id = 3
left join security_users sugu on sg.guardian_id = sugu.id
left join user_body_masses as ubm on ubm.security_user_id  = ist.student_id and 	ubm.academic_period_id = ist.academic_period_id
left join genders g on stu.gender_id = g.id
left join area_administratives bro on stu.birthplace_area_id = bro.id 
left join area_administratives ds on stu.address_area_id = ds.id  
left join nationalities nati on stu.nationality_id = nati.id 
left join identity_types idt on stu.nationality_id = idt.id
Left join user_special_needs on ist.id = user_special_needs.security_user_id
left join special_need_types on special_need_types.id = user_special_needs.special_need_type_id
left join special_need_difficulties on special_need_difficulties.id = user_special_needs.special_need_difficulty_id
left join user_body_masses bmit on stu.id = bmit.security_user_id
left join academic_periods acp on acp.id = bmit.academic_period_id
left join academic_periods acps on acps.id = ist.academic_period_id
left join institution_subject_students iss on stu.id = iss.student_id
left join education_subjects edus on edus.id = iss.education_subject_id
left join nationalities natif on sufu.nationality_id = natif.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join nationalities natim on sumu.nationality_id = natif.id and sgm.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join nationalities natig on sugu.nationality_id = natif.id and sg.guardian_relation_id = 3
left join identity_types idtf on sufu.nationality_id = idtf.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 1
left join identity_types idtm on sumu.nationality_id = idtm.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 2
left join identity_types idtg on sugu.nationality_id = idtg.id and sgf.guardian_relation_id = 3
where i.id = $code
group by stu.openemis_no

SELECT  i.name as `School Name` , i.code as `Census Code` ,  i.address  as `Address`, a.name as `Zone` from institutions i
inner join areas a on a.id = i.area_id
where i.id =  $code
select * from institution_info_view where institution_id = '$insid'

select 
     ug.name as metric ,count(*) as value ,
    $__time(su.created, '1h')
    from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
 inner join institutions as inst on ist.institution_id = inst.id
 inner join security_users as su on su.id = ist.student_id
 inner join areas as ia on inst.area_id = ia.id
 inner join genders as ug on ug.id = su.gender_id
 where inst.id = $code 
group by ug.id;

SELECT
  modified AS "time",
  id
FROM academic_period_levels
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(modified)
ORDER BY modified

select 
    count(CASE WHEN ubm.body_mass_index <  13 THEN ubm.body_mass_index END) as `Underweight`,
    count(CASE WHEN ubm.body_mass_index > 13 and ubm.body_mass_index <= 16  THEN ubm.body_mass_index END) as `Normal`  ,
    count(CASE WHEN ubm.body_mass_index > 16 and ubm.body_mass_index <= 18.25  THEN ubm.body_mass_index END) as `Overweight`,
    count(CASE WHEN ubm.body_mass_index > 18.25  THEN ubm.body_mass_index END) as `Severely obese`,
    $__time(ins.created, '1h')
    from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) inst
    inner join institutions as ins on ins.id = inst.institution_id
    inner join user_body_masses as ubm on ubm.security_user_id  = inst.student_id and 	ubm.academic_period_id = inst.academic_period_id
    where ins.id = $code;

select 
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G1' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-1` ,  
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G2' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-2` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G3' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-3` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G4' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-4` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G5' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-5` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G6' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-6` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G7' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-7` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G8' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-8` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G9' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-9` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G10' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-10` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code = 'G11' THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-11` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code like "%12%" THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-12` ,
    (count(CASE WHEN eg.code like "%13%" THEN ist.student_id END)) as `G-13` ,
    $__time(su.created, '1h')
    from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
 inner join institutions as inst on ist.institution_id = inst.id
 inner join security_users as su on su.id = ist.student_id
 inner join areas as ia on inst.area_id = ia.id
 inner join education_grades as eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
 where inst.id = "$code"  
group by inst.id;

select count(*)  
from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
-- inner join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
inner join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
-- inner join education_grades eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
where  ist.institution_id = $code

select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
inner join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
left join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
where  i.id = $code
and stu.gender_id = 1

select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
inner join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
left join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
where  i.id = $code
and stu.gender_id = 2

SELECT openemis.institutions.name,openemis.institutions.code, openemis.institutions.latitude,openemis.institutions.longitude , ia.name as Zone , FORMAT(COUNT(*),0) as NumberOfStudents 
 FROM
      (SELECT count(openemis.institution_students.modified)
         FROM openemis.institution_students 
       ) institution_students  
       inner join openemis.institutions 
       inner join openemis.institution_students 
     on openemis.institution_students.institution_id = openemis.institutions.id 
     inner join openemis.areas as ia on openemis.institutions.area_id = ia.id
     inner join openemis.areas as pa on pa.id = ia.parent_id
      where institutions.latitude > 0 and openemis.institutions.id  = $code
     GROUP BY openemis.institution_students.institution_id

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC
select `G-1`,`G-2`,`G-3`,`G-4`,`G-5`,`G-6`,`G-7`,`G-8`,`G-9`,`G-10`,`G-11`,`G-12`,`G-13`, now() as time_sec from  students_count_by_grade_view where  institution_id = '$insid'

panels.title: Number of Students By Grade dummy

targets.rawSql:
select eg.name as `Grade` , ic.name as `Class` , ct.first_name as `Class Teacher`,  format(count(*),0)   as `No of Students`  
from (SELECT DISTINCT it.institution_id,it.student_id,it.education_grade_id,it.academic_period_id from institution_students it) ist
inner join institutions i on ist.institution_id = i.id
inner join security_users stu on ist.student_id = stu.id
inner join education_grades eg on eg.id = ist.education_grade_id
inner join institution_student_admission isa on isa.student_id = ist.student_id
inner join institution_classes as ic on ic.id = isa.institution_class_id
left join security_users ct on ct.id = ic.staff_id
where  i.id = $code
group by ic.name

list.definition: select security_group_institutions.institution_id from security_users inner join security_group_users on security_group_users.security_user_id = security_users.id inner join security_group_institutions on security_group_institutions.security_group_id = security_group_users.security_group_id where  security_users.username = '${__user.login}'  group by security_group_institutions.institution_id limit 1
list.name: insId
list.query: select security_group_institutions.institution_id from security_users inner join security_group_users on security_group_users.security_user_id = security_users.id inner join security_group_institutions on security_group_institutions.security_group_id = security_group_users.security_group_id where  security_users.username = '${__user.login}'  group by security_group_institutions.institution_id limit 1

list.definition: select name from institution_classes where institution_id = $insId
list.label: Classes
list.name: class
list.query: select name from institution_classes where institution_id = $insId
